title: Structure bank product categories and types
content_markdown:
Version: 8.3Creatio Financial Services CRM
On this page
Use the **Product categories and types** lookup to structure bank product categories and types and to manage linked customer and product parameters.
The product category in the **Product categories and types** lookup includes multiple product types (Fig. 1).
Fig. 1 Structure of the Product categories and types lookup
![Fig. 1 Structure of the Product categories and types lookup](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_lookup_categories_and_types.png)
note
Configuring document packages and condition change criteria at the category or product type level is deprecated and no longer supported. Use the **Document package** tab on the **Product details** page instead.
## Create a product category​
To add a product category to the lookup:
1. Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn-system-designer-8.png) to **open the System Designer**.
2. **Click the Lookups** link in the **System setup** block.
3. **Open the Product categories and types** lookup. 
4. **Click the New category** button (Fig. 2).
Fig. 2 Add a product category to the Product categories and types lookup
![Fig. 2 Add a product category to the Product categories and types lookup](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_lookup_categories_and_types_new_category.png)
5. **Enter the product category name** , for example, "Loan," and select the class, for example, "Product" (Fig. 3).
Fig. 3 Add a new product category
![Fig. 3 Add a new product category](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_lookup_categories_and_types_add_new_category.png)
6. **Click OK**.
7. **Add other product categories** to the lookup in the same manner.
## Add product types​
To add product types to a category:
1. **Select the needed category** on the right and click the ![](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/sites/default/files/inline-images/btn_com_menu_gear_1.png) button.
2. **Select the New type** command (Fig. 4).
Fig. 4 Adding a new product type to a category
![Fig. 4 Adding a new product type to a category](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/scr_lookup_new_type.png)
3. **Enter the product type name** (for example, "Unsecured personal loan").
4. **Save the changes**.
5. **Add other product types** of this category in the same manner.
## Set up parameters for product categories and types​
1. **Select the needed category or type** on the right.
2. Click the ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn-add-record.png) button on the **Parameters** expanded list to **open the parameters list**.
3. **Choose the required parameters** in the selection window and click **Select**. The selected parameters appear in the list.
**As a result,** all added parameters will be available on the **Product details** page for the products assigned to selected category or type.
## Add new parameters for product categories and types​
To create a new parameter:
1. **Select the needed category or type** on the right.
2. **Click** the ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn-add-record.png) button on the **Parameters** expanded list to **open the parameters list**. This opens a window.
3. **Click New**.
4. **Fill out Name** and **Value type** fields.
5. Choose one of the following in the **Parameter classification** field:
* Customer parameter
* Product feature
6. Optionally, **specify Unit of measure** , **Code** , and **Description**.
7. If the **Value type** is set to "Drop-down list", **define the list values**
* Click ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/images/Finance_and_Banking/financial_services_8_3_1/finserv_product_catalogue/btn-add-record.png) in the **Values list** expanded list → enter the names of the options that should appear in the drop-down list. These values will exist only within this parameter and cannot be referenced elsewhere in the system.
* Fill in the **Connect with lookup** field to use records from an existing lookup. Such parameters can be reused in business processes, scripts, and customization logic.
8. **Click Save**.
**As a result,** the new parameter will be added to the parameters list of selected category or type automatically.
* * *
## See also​
[Create a card](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=1076)
[Create a financial account](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=1078)
[Form product conditions](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2156)
[Copy a product with conditions](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2157)
